channel.title: Yell Command Help rep++
channel.description:
When owners yell; it looks like this. [code]else if (c.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[/code]
there is the lil golden crown. Is there anyway i can put a new symbol like that? <img=4> or something like that?
How would i go about doing this!
I will rep++ as this sounds quite hard to explain!

item.title: Yell Command Help rep++
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

For a webclient you have to jar your client. You can pack the images into the cache using Tom’s Cache Editor.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command Help rep++
item.dc:creator: @Script Script`
item.description:
@Script wrote:

NumberEleven:

Yeah, just realised its client side! This then means i would have to rejar my server, and i dont know how :\

LOL, You don’t have to jar your server.

There’s plenty of youtube videos on how to jar a client.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

else if (c.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

there is the lil golden crown. Is there anyway i can put a new symbol like that?
<img=4> or something like that?

How would i go about doing this!

I will rep++ as this sounds quite hard to explain![/quote]

I believe the images are set in the cache.

Read full topic
